main_title: India's Thuggee Cult: Strangling for Kali
hook: [mysterious] What if I told you that for centuries, a secret society in India was strangling travelers in the name of the goddess Kali? The Thuggees, operating from the 17th to the 19th centuries, murdered an estimated 2 million people.
description: Discover the chilling truth behind India's Thuggee Cult and their ritualistic murders for Kali. #Thuggee #Kali #HistoryMysteries
